infospect

Class InformationSpectrum

  • java.lang.Object
    • infospect.InformationSpectrum

  • public class InformationSpectrum
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InformationSpectrum(int[] source)
      Generate *Toroidal* spectral analysis of information content for for the array passed at initialization (See README.txt at https://github.com/kdbanman/InfoSpect for explanation and examples).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static InformationSpectrum analyzeArray(int[] source)
      Static wrapper of constructor so that library may be used statically, returns the InformationSpectrum corresponding to the passed source array.
      int getBlockSizeRepetitionCount(int blockSize)
      Returns the frequency with which blocks of a given size were repeated within the initializing array (this corresponds to quering the Block Size / Repetition Count tables in the README.txt at https://github.com/kdbanman/InfoSpect).
      int getMaxBlockSize()
      Returns the maximum size that a repeated block can be for the array with which the InformationSpectrum was initialized.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Convenience method to run hard-coded tests, including performance tests for your machine.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a well-formatted table of the spectral analysis data.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InformationSpectrum

        public InformationSpectrum(int[] source)
        Generate *Toroidal* spectral analysis of information content for for the array passed at initialization (See README.txt at https://github.com/kdbanman/InfoSpect for explanation and examples). (Non-toroidal isn't useful to me right now, so it's not done.)
        Parameters:
        source - Array of integers of length > 2 for toroidal spectral analysis.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxBlockSize

        public int getMaxBlockSize()
        Returns the maximum size that a repeated block can be for the array with which the InformationSpectrum was initialized. (The minimum is 2.)

      • getBlockSizeRepetitionCount

        public int getBlockSizeRepetitionCount(int blockSize)
        Returns the frequency with which blocks of a given size were repeated within the initializing array (this corresponds to quering the Block Size / Repetition Count tables in the README.txt at https://github.com/kdbanman/InfoSpect). Valid block size parameters range from 2 to N-1 (where N is the length of the initializing array). Invalid queries return -1.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a well-formatted table of the spectral analysis data.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • analyzeArray

        public static InformationSpectrum analyzeArray(int[] source)
        Static wrapper of constructor so that library may be used statically, returns the InformationSpectrum corresponding to the passed source array.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Convenience method to run hard-coded tests, including performance tests for your machine.
